Posts.Content: Charliestweetie wrote: Hi!!!  My final pathology report came in. I am so blown off: what was supposed to be a Stage 1 IDC turn into a Stage 3 with 24/24 nodes involved and 6 tumors in my right breast---one was 1 inch---which neither an MRI or mammogram had picked up. The only indication that something was wrong, were those microcalcifications. I am scared out of my mind--I never expected to be a Stage 3. What to do know? How can I beat this shit? Charliestweetie  Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Just got the news... Charliestweetie pp729

Posts.Content: Charliestweetie wrote: Who of you sisters had one before starting chemo? Thanks!!!! Charliestweetie  Log in to post a reply

Posts.Content: Charliestweetie wrote: Hi!!! Just got some bits and pieces from the path report.  I have a Grade 3, Estrogene postive, progesterone postive, HER2 negative. Diameter is 5 mm. Still waiting for the MRI results. What do you think? I am shocked that it is a Grade 3. Thanks!!! Hugs Charliestweetie  Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Path report---bits and pieces---what do you think? Charliestweetie Charliestweetie

D., highly dosed Vit. C infusions, melatonin, green tea extract..... What supplements are you taking to beat this s..t? Thanks!!!! Charliestweetie  Log in to post a reply
